org.ranksys.novdiv.reranking

Class DitheringReranker<U,I>

  • java.lang.Object
    • es.uam.eps.ir.ranksys.novdiv.reranking.PermutationReranker<U,I>
      • org.ranksys.novdiv.reranking.DitheringReranker<U,I>
  • Type Parameters:
    U - type of the users
    I - type of the items
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Reranker<U,I>

    public class DitheringReranker<U,I>
extends PermutationReranker<U,I>
    Dithering re-ranker. It re-ranks the output of a recommendation by adding gaussian noise.
    Check: https://buildingrecommenders.wordpress.com/2015/11/11/dithering/
    Author:
    Sa√∫l Vargas (Saul.Vargas@mendeley.com)
